title: Question 16:
description: Now that I've staked SNX and minted sUSD, what can I do with it?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
If you've just staked your SNX to mint sUSD, there are a variety of things you can do with it. 

Firstly, there is Synthetix.Exchange, which is a trading platform allowing you to trade your sUSD for any of our synthetic assets (Synths). It currently supports a variety of forex currencies (e.g. sEUR), cryptocurrencies (e.g. sBTC), and assets (e.g. gold/ounce as sXAU). The best thing is, it doesn't require a counterparty, so there's no waiting around for your trade to get filled. So for example, if you'd like exposure to Bitcoin without leaving Ethereum, you can trade your sUSD for sBTC on Synthetix.Exchange. Fees on each trade depends on the synth flavor you are trading into, these fees are displayed before confirming a trade on synthetix.exchange. The fees are distributed to SNX holders as reward for staking the system.

fields.title: ​
fields.value:
Secondly, you can take your sUSD to 1inch.exchange. 1inch is an aggregator that will swap your sUSD at the best rate possible or you can stake your sUSD in curve.fi and earn SNX rewards, on https://www.curve.fi/susdv2/. 

Thirdly, you can lend it out on a lending platform such as AAVE.

fields.title: For more details visit our help page:
